<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/us-government-tries-kickstart-vaccine-rollout-new-guidelines?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Vaccine Rollout Goes from 0 to 65
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="0 to 65" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNjgyLzBfdG9fNjUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To kickstart a lagging vaccination rollout, the US government yesterday <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-12/u-s-officials-urge-states-to-widen-covid-vaccine-access?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">recommended</a> that states make Covid-19 vaccines available to <em>anyone</em> over the age of 65 and to people of any age with pre-existing conditions. Officials hope the new guidelines will help simplify what has been a mind-numbingly complex, fragmented, and tedious process.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In another shift in strategy, the US will make second doses available. Remember, last week we <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/08/biden-administration-plans-release-almost-available-vaccine-doses-break-trump-plan?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explained</a> that the administration was holding about half of the vaccine supply in storage to make sure that second doses were available when needed. That plan was criticized as being unnecessarily cautious, and the Trump administration has <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/vaccine-should-be-given-to-anyone-over-65-health-officials-expected-to-urge-11610462365?mod=hp_lead_pos1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">come around</a>.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"We now believe that our manufacturing is predictable enough that we can ensure second doses are available to people from ongoing production. So everything is now available to our states and our healthcare providers," Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar said on ABC yesterday. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">But where to deliver the shots? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Since vaccination is America's new national pastime, there's only one answer: NYC will <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/new-york-city-to-turn-citi-field-into-mega-covid-vaccination-site-mayor-says-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">convert</a> the home of the New York Mets, Citi Field, into a 24/7 coronavirus vaccination site by the end of the month, Mayor de Blasio said yesterday.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The announcement was made jointly with Steve Cohen, the billionaire hedge fund manager who recently bought the Mets. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The goal is to administer between 5,000 and 7,000 shots per day. Yankees fans will be admitted.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Southern California, whose hospitals are <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2021/jan/12/the-horror-stories-are-countless-inside-the-la-hospital-at-the-center-of-the-covid-crisis?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">filled with Covid patients</a>, is following a similar gameplan. It's <a href="https://ew.com/news/disneyland-covid-19-vaccination-site/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">turning Disneyland</a> into a mass-vaccination site by the end of the week. Dodger Stadium, which is the biggest Covid testing site in the country, is undergoing a similar makeover.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The country's largest entertainment venues have shape-shifted over the past year to fill a variety of crisis-era roles, including field hospitals, voting sites, and testing centers. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The sooner they start selling hot dogs again, the better for the economy. After a disastrous 2020, vaccines could unleash <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy-vaccines/jabs-equal-jobs-fed-sees-possible-economic-boom-if-vaccine-gets-on-track-idUSKBN29H18R?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">booming economic growth</a> this year, Fed officials say. </p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
AUTO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/gm-spin-electric-delivery-arm?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
General Batteries
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Day 2 of consumer tech show CES, GM launched the next phase of Operation Beat Tesla: an electric delivery and logistics arm, <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2021/1/12/22225394/gm-brightdrop-electric-delivery-ep1-ev600-ces-2021?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">BrightDrop</a>. This year, BrightDrop will roll out...</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">EP1:</strong></span><span> an electric pallet that lugs packages from warehouses to delivery vans and delivery vans to your doorstep.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">EV600: </strong></span><span>an electric delivery van with a 250-mile range. The first vehicles should be delivered by the end of 2021, with 500 destined for a FedEx route near you.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>BrightDrop will also offer delivery software and services, including location tracking, remote lock, and predictive maintenance.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The announcement revved investors and <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/gm-shares-hit-record-high-on-electric-van-and-flying-car-potential-plans.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sent</a> GM shares up as much as 8.8% to a record high. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>GM's in the middle of a $27 billion pivot to electric vehicles and plans on <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/19/electric-vehicle-roundup-gm-ups-investments-uk-accelerates-gas-vehicle-ban?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">unveiling</a> 30 new models by 2025. In the delivery market, it's now competing with Mercedes-Benz, Ford, and buzzy startups including Rivian (which is working with Amazon), Deliver-E, and Canoo. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">One more thing...</strong>GM is <a href="https://www.cnet.com/roadshow/news/gm-surprises-with-cadillac-evtol-air-taxi-at-ces-2021/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">preparing</a> for our <em>Jetsons</em> future with this Cadillac-branded electric air taxi. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">  <img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNjg0L2dtX2NhZGlsbGFjX2hhbG8uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIn0=" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""><br><em>GM</em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
OBIT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/gambling-hospitality-magnate-sheldon-adelson-dies?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Casino Magnate Sheldon Adelson Dies at 87
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Casino magnate Sheldon Adelson " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNjc4L3NoZWxkb25fYWRlbHNvbi5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Mandel Ngan/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Late Monday night, casino tycoon Sheldon Adelson <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/12/business/sheldon-adelson-death/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">died</a> due to complications related to his treatment for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, his company Las Vegas Sands Corp announced. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Tycoon might be an understatement. </strong>Adelson ran the world's largest casino empire and was among the wealthiest people on Earth. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>After a hardscrabble upbringing in Boston, Adelson started a computer trade show called Comdex, which he sold in 1995 for almost $900 million. He then muscled his way into the casino biz. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>His company's crown jewels include several casinos in Macau, Singapore's Marina Bay Sands, and Las Vegas's Venetian, which at 8,000 suites and rooms is really a small town with gondolas. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">For decades, if you had conservative political ambitions, you wanted Adelson on your side. </strong>He <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/12/business/sheldon-adelson-dead.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">contributed</a> huge sums to right-wing candidates and causes in the US and Israel, eventually becoming a make-or-break donor for Republican hopefuls. Adelson and his wife, Miriam, were the largest publicly disclosed donors in the 2020 race, per the Center for Responsive Politics. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">

<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Adelson+ran+the+world%E2%80%99s+largest+casino+empire+&url=https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/gambling-hospitality-magnate-sheldon-adelson-dies&via=MorningBrew" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e86576e04837.jpg">

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Now that you’ve said “Ta Ta!” to 2020, you're probably finalizing your resolutions for 2021. And since you’re so mature and smart, you’re no doubt focusing on financial goals. </p>

</tr>
</table>
<img alt="jet contrails" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTY4L2pldF9jb250cmFpbHMuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Between the fallout from the 737 Max scandal and a pandemic that smushed airline travel, 2020 was harder for Boeing to stomach than economy class ratatouille. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The company <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/boeings-2020-aircraft-cancellations-worst-on-record-despite-december-max-orders.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">delivered</a> just 157 planes (the fewest since 1984), logged its worst year of net sales, experienced ~650 order cancellations, and slashed production rates and staff.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">One ray of hope:</strong></span><span> After regulators lifted a 20-month ban on the 737 Max in November, Boeing squeezed in 80+ orders for the plane as carriers including Ryanair and Alaska Airlines went "bargain hunting." </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Still, these numbers mean Airbus, a 50-year rival, will retain the No. 1 aircraft maker title it wrestled from Boeing's grip in 2019. Last year, Airbus delivered 566 planes, 34% fewer than in 2019, and sold just 268 planes after cancellations. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">One challenge for Airbus:</strong> After failing to patch a 16-year dispute with the EU over government aircraft subsidies, the US government <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trade-eu-aircraft/new-u-s-tariffs-on-french-german-aircraft-parts-to-start-tuesday-idUSKBN29H007?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">enacted</a> 15% duties on imported German and French aircraft parts yesterday. Down the line, this could affect Airbus production, which was expected to pick back up.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CRYPTOCURRENCY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/happens-lose-crypto-key?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Frantic Bitcoin Holders Check the Tiny Pocket Inside the Pocket
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="People searching their pockets " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/vvWvR1QZfF9p6ljrx6/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="People searching their pockets " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/vvWvR1QZfF9p6ljrx6/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Some bitcoin holders are experiencing that feeling when you can’t find your car keys, panic, and turn your apartment upside down looking for them—but in this case, there are millions of dollars in the backseat. As their digital wallets soar in value, some investors can’t cash in because they forgot their passwords, according to a <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/12/technology/bitcoin-passwords-wallets-fortunes.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">NYT report</a>. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>One programmer in SF has two password guesses left to access a wallet containing 7,002 bitcoin, or ~$220 million.  </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Of the 18.5 million bitcoin in existence, about 20%—$140 billion worth—seems to be lost or abandoned, per crypto data company Chainalysis.  </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It’s not a good time to not be able to access your bitcoin. Despite a recent dip, the crypto is still up about 335% in the past year. Relatedly, inquiries to Wallet Recovery Services, a business that helps crypto holders find their keys, have tripled in the past month. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>These frustrations flip the much-touted benefits of crypto. Only the person who creates a wallet has access to the key, which is great for privacy and freedom from regulation, but terrible if you lose it—you have no recourse. </p>

In his first public remarks since last Wednesday's attack on the Capitol, President Trump defended the speech he gave before the riot as \"totally appropriate.\" He also \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-tech/trump-says-big-tech-is-dividing-the-country-after-his-supporters-attack-congress-idUSKBN29H2C4?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecriticized\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Big Tech, which has largely removed Trump from their platforms, as “dividing and divisive.”\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMarkets: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe major indexes did a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/11/stock-market-futures-open-to-close-news.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewhole bunch of nothing\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e ahead of earnings season, which begins on Friday. Small caps, though, rose to a record high. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!-- END MARKETS --\u003e\n\u003c!-- ARTICLE ---\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"c6 \" style=\"margin-bottom:7px\"\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003cth class=\"card\" style=\"text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px\"\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding: 15px;\"\u003e\n\u003ch3 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nHEALTH \n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/12/us-government-tries-kickstart-vaccine-rollout-new-guidelines?email={{profile.email}}\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nVaccine Rollout Goes from 0 to 65\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"0 to 65\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNjgyLzBfdG9fNjUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTo kickstart a lagging vaccination rollout, the US government yesterday \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-12/u-s-officials-urge-states-to-widen-covid-vaccine-access?srnd=premium\u0026sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erecommended\u003c/a\u003e that states make Covid-19 vaccines available to \u003cem\u003eanyone\u003c/em\u003e over the age of 65 and to people of any age with pre-existing conditions. Officials hope the new guidelines will help simplify what has been a mind-numbingly complex, fragmented, and tedious process.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn another shift in strategy, the US will make second doses available. Remember, last week we \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/08/biden-administration-plans-release-almost-available-vaccine-doses-break-trump-plan?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eexplained\u003c/a\u003e that the administration was holding about half of the vaccine supply in storage to make sure that second doses were available when needed. That plan was criticized as being unnecessarily cautious, and the Trump administration has \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/vaccine-should-be-given-to-anyone-over-65-health-officials-expected-to-urge-11610462365?mod=hp_lead_pos1\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecome around\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\"We now believe that our manufacturing is predictable enough that we can ensure second doses are available to people from ongoing production. So everything is now available to our states and our healthcare providers,\" Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar said on ABC yesterday. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eBut where to deliver the shots? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSince vaccination is America's new national pastime, there's only one answer: NYC will \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/new-york-city-to-turn-citi-field-into-mega-covid-vaccination-site-mayor-says-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003econvert\u003c/a\u003e the home of the New York Mets, Citi Field, into a 24/7 coronavirus vaccination site by the end of the month, Mayor de Blasio said yesterday.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe announcement was made jointly with Steve Cohen, the billionaire hedge fund manager who recently bought the Mets. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe goal is to administer between 5,000 and 7,000 shots per day. Yankees fans will be admitted.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSouthern California, whose hospitals are \u003ca href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2021/jan/12/the-horror-stories-are-countless-inside-the-la-hospital-at-the-center-of-the-covid-crisis?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efilled with Covid patients\u003c/a\u003e, is following a similar gameplan. It's \u003ca href=\"https://ew.com/news/disneyland-covid-19-vaccination-site/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eturning Disneyland\u003c/a\u003e into a mass-vaccination site by the end of the week. Dodger Stadium, which is the biggest Covid testing site in the country, is undergoing a similar makeover.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe country's largest entertainment venues have shape-shifted over the past year to fill a variety of crisis-era roles, including field hospitals, voting sites, and testing centers. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe sooner they start selling hot dogs again, the better for the economy. After a disastrous 2020, vaccines could unleash \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy-vaccines/jabs-equal-jobs-fed-sees-possible-economic-boom-if-vaccine-gets-on-track-idUSKBN29H18R?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebooming economic growth\u003c/a\u003e this year, Fed officials This year, BrightDrop will roll out...\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eEP1:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e an electric pallet that lugs packages from warehouses to delivery vans and delivery vans to your doorstep.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eEV600: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003ean electric delivery van with a 250-mile range. The first vehicles should be delivered by the end of 2021, with 500 destined for a FedEx route near you.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBrightDrop will also offer delivery software and services, including location tracking, remote lock, and predictive maintenance.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe announcement revved investors and \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/gm-shares-hit-record-high-on-electric-van-and-flying-car-potential-plans.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esent\u003c/a\u003e GM shares up as much as 8.8% to a record high. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eGM's in the middle of a $27 billion pivot to electric vehicles and plans on \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/11/19/electric-vehicle-roundup-gm-ups-investments-uk-accelerates-gas-vehicle-ban?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eunveiling\u003c/a\u003e 30 new models by 2025. collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eLate Monday night, casino tycoon Sheldon Adelson \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/12/business/sheldon-adelson-death/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edied\u003c/a\u003e due to complications related to his treatment for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, his company Las Vegas Sands Corp announced. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTycoon might be an understatement. \u003c/strong\u003eAdelson ran the world's largest casino empire and was among the wealthiest people on Earth. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAfter a hardscrabble upbringing in Boston, Adelson started a computer trade show called Comdex, which he sold in 1995 for almost $900 million. He then muscled his way into the casino biz. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHis company's crown jewels include several casinos in Macau, Singapore's Marina Bay Sands, and Las Vegas's Venetian, which at 8,000 suites and rooms is really a small town with gondolas. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor decades, if you had conservative political ambitions, you wanted Adelson on your side. \u003c/strong\u003eHe \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/12/business/sheldon-adelson-dead.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003econtributed\u003c/a\u003e huge sums to right-wing candidates and causes in the US and Israel, eventually becoming a make-or-break donor for Republican hopefuls. Adelson and his wife, Miriam, were the largest publicly disclosed donors in the 2020 race, per the Center for Responsive Politics. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBetween the fallout from the 737 Max scandal and a pandemic that smushed airline travel, 2020 was harder for Boeing to stomach than economy class ratatouille. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe company \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/12/boeings-2020-aircraft-cancellations-worst-on-record-despite-december-max-orders.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edelivered\u003c/a\u003e just 157 planes (the fewest since 1984), logged its worst year of net sales, experienced ~650 order cancellations, and slashed production rates and staff.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne ray of hope:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e After regulators lifted a 20-month ban on the 737 Max in November, Boeing squeezed in 80+ orders for the plane as carriers including Ryanair and Alaska Airlines went \"bargain hunting.\" \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eStill, these numbers mean Airbus, a 50-year rival, will retain the No. 1 aircraft maker title it wrestled from Boeing's grip in 2019. Last year, Airbus delivered 566 planes, 34% fewer than in 2019, and sold just 268 planes after cancellations. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne challenge for Airbus:\u003c/strong\u003e After failing to patch a 16-year dispute with the EU over government aircraft subsidies, the US government \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trade-eu-aircraft/new-u-s-tariffs-on-french-german-aircraft-parts-to-start-tuesday-idUSKBN29H007?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eenacted\u003c/a\u003e 15% duties on imported German and French aircraft parts yesterday. Down the line, this could affect Airbus production, which was expected to pick back up.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSome bitcoin holders are experiencing that feeling when you can’t find your car keys, panic, and turn your apartment upside down looking for them—but in this case, there are millions of dollars in the backseat. As their digital wallets soar in value, some investors can’t cash in because they forgot their passwords, according to a \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/12/technology/bitcoin-passwords-wallets-fortunes.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eNYT report\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOne programmer in SF has two password guesses left to access a wallet containing 7,002 bitcoin, or ~$220 million.  \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOf the 18.5 million bitcoin in existence, about 20%—$140 billion worth—seems to be lost or abandoned, per crypto data company Chainalysis.  \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt’s not a good time to not be able to access your bitcoin. Despite a recent dip, the crypto is still up about 335% in the past year. Relatedly, inquiries to Wallet Recovery Services, a business that helps crypto holders find their keys, have tripled in the past month. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThese frustrations flip the much-touted benefits of crypto. Only the person who creates a wallet has access to the key, which is great for privacy and freedom from regulation, but terrible if you lose it—you have no recourse. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL
